item.title: Azure Bot Service Direct Line Speech
item.description: Anne Uumellmahaye voice bot Recreating Anne Uumellmahaye using AI from the film The Man with Two Brains. Spooktacular fun with the Azure Bot Service - Direct Line Speech Architecture Technologies used Azure Bot Service and Direct Line Channel Bot Framework Microsoft Cognitive Services Dispatcher LUIS QnA Maker Speech SDK Azure Functions Spotify API UWP Raspberry Pi running Windows 10 IoT Halloween head Who’s Freddy? See Freddy the fish
